languages.text: Belief in the holiness and infallibility of the laws of the Imperium. Adherence to the precepts of the God-Emperor and the holy chosen ones, carrying out His will to the ignorant and unruly masses. Unfettered hatred of the enemies of Mankind, be they traitors, heretics, xenos, or servants of Chaos.
languages.original_text: Вера в святость и непогрешимость законов Империума. Приверженность заветам Бога-Императора и святых избранников, проводящих волю Его в невежественные и дезорганизованные массы. Ненависть к врагам Человечества, будь то изменники, еретики, ксеносы или слуги Хаоса.

languages.text: Der Glaube an die Heiligkeit und Unfehlbarkeit der Gesetze des Imperiums. Die Befolgung der Gebote des Gottimperators und der heiligen Auserkorenen, die seinen Willen gegenüber den unwissenden und widerspenstigen Massen durchsetzen. Uneingeschränkter Hass auf die Gegner der Menschheit, seien es Verräter, Ketzer, Xenos oder Diener des Chaos.
languages.original_text: Belief in the holiness and infallibility of the laws of the Imperium. Adherence to the precepts of the God-Emperor and the holy chosen ones, carrying out His will to the ignorant and unruly masses. Unfettered hatred of the enemies of Mankind, be they traitors, heretics, xenos, or servants of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: Der Glaube an die Heiligkeit und Unfehlbarkeit der Gesetze des Imperiums. languages.text: Croyance fondée sur le caractère sacré et infaillible des lois de l'Imperium. Adhésion aux préceptes de l'Empereur-Dieu et des saints élus qui transmettent la parole divine aux masses ignorantes et insoumises. Haine inconditionnelle envers les ennemis de l'Humanité, qu'il s'agisse de traîtres, d'hérétiques, de xénos ou de serviteurs du Chaos.
languages.original_text: Belief in the holiness and infallibility of the laws of the Imperium. Adherence to the precepts of the God-Emperor and the holy chosen ones, carrying out His will to the ignorant and unruly masses. Unfettered hatred of the enemies of Mankind, be they traitors, heretics, xenos, or servants of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: Croyance basée sur le caractère sacré et infaillible des lois de l'Imperium. Adhésion aux préceptes de l'Empereur-Dieu et des saints élus qui transmettent la parole divine aux masses ignorantes et insoumises. Haine inconditionnelle envers les ennemis de l'Humanité, qu'il s'agisse de traîtres, d'hérétiques, de xénos ou de serviteurs du Chaos.

languages.text: 对帝国神圣律法的信仰。坚守对神皇的信仰，执行祂的神圣戒律，向那些不守规矩的愚蠢暴民实施祂的意志。邪恶的人类之敌，包括人类之中的叛徒、异形分子、异形，以及混沌的仆从。
languages.original_text: Belief in the holiness and infallibility of the laws of the Imperium. Adherence to the precepts of the God-Emperor and the holy chosen ones, carrying out His will to the ignorant and unruly masses. Unfettered hatred of the enemies of Mankind, be they traitors, heretics, xenos, or servants of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: 对帝国神圣律法的信仰。坚守对神皇的信仰，执行祂的神圣戒律，向那些不守规矩的愚蠢暴民实施祂的意志。邪恶的人类之敌，包括人类之中的叛徒、异形分子、异形，以及混沌的仆从。

languages.text: La creencia en la santidad e infalibilidad de las leyes del Imperium. Devoción a los preceptos del Dios Emperador y Sus elegidos sagrados, que transmiten Su voluntad a las masas ignorantes e indisciplinadas. Odio desbocado a los enemigos de la Humanidad, ya sean traidores, herejes, xenos o siervos del Caos.
languages.original_text: Belief in the holiness and infallibility of the laws of the Imperium. Adherence to the precepts of the God-Emperor and the holy chosen ones, carrying out His will to the ignorant and unruly masses. Unfettered hatred of the enemies of Mankind, be they traitors, heretics, xenos, or servants of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: La creencia en la santidad e infalibilidad de las leyes del Imperium. Devoción a los preceptos del Dios Emperador y Sus elegidos sagrados, que transmiten Su voluntad a las masas ignorantes e indisciplinadas. Odio desbocado a los enemigos de la Humanidad, ya sean traidores, herejes, xenos o siervos del Caos.

languages.text: 帝国の法の神聖さと無謬性に対する信心。神帝陛下および神聖なる選ばれし者の戒律を遵守し、陛下の意志を無知かつ無節操な民衆に伝える。裏切り者、異端者、ゼノあるいは渾沌の僕など、人類の敵に対する何事にも縛られない憎悪。
languages.original_text: Belief in the holiness and infallibility of the laws of the Imperium. Adherence to the precepts of the God-Emperor and the holy chosen ones, carrying out His will to the ignorant and unruly masses. Unfettered hatred of the enemies of Mankind, be they traitors, heretics, xenos, or servants of Chaos.

languages.text: İmparatorluk yasalarının kutsallığına ve şaşmazlığına duyulan inanç. Tanrı İmparator'un ve O'nun ilkelerini cahil, serkeş kitlelere ileten seçilmişlerinin emirlerine bağlılık. İster hain ister kâfir isterse de zeno veya Kaos'un hizmetkârı olsun, İnsanlığa düşman herkese ve her şeye karşı mutlak nefret.
